Little Caesars Enterprises Detroit MI November 2018 to Present Applications Work on the PHP application that is used for creating sales reports in the stores Work with business team members and follow business requirement documents to fix bugs Refactor the sales reports to make the code easier to maintain debug and improve the accuracy of the numbers Create debugging tools for the reporting application that shows the performance of the application and what data and functions have been loaded into memory Use Git for version control Databases Work with Microsoft SQL Server and PerconaMySQL Do performance tuning on the store and corporate databases which vary between 50gb and 500gb in size Refactor queries to make better use of the available indexes and add new indexes where needed string manipulation arrays objectoriented programming filesystem access and using PHP extensions
